Soldier, my comrades and I require assistance, and you look like a pretty capable .

What's in it for you, you ask? Well, besides getting to know me, the Hands of Velika reward generously for a job well done.

If your interest is thoroughly piqued, go talk to {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} over there.

So, you spoke to Taratia? She's persuasive, eh? That's why we keep her around! I kid. Actually, no, that is why.

Listen, if you want to help, we desperately need an item crafted. But this is no pair of booties for your sister's kid. We need someone highly skilled.

Does that describe you? Good. Deliver your completed craft to Barian. You'll be compensated, of course.

Wonderful!

Pay {@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} another visit if you want to get paid.

See what I did there? "Pay her" to get "paid?" I kill me. Done talking.

Xersteel ingot. Xersteel ingot. Xersteel ingot.

Don't you just love the way that sounds?

Only thing better is the way it looks. Craft me one, will you?

Wonderful!

See {@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} if you want to see your reward.

See what I did there? "See her" if you want to "see" your reward. Wait, that wasn't funny at all.
Craft some galvasilex and bring it to me. Rest assured, you'll be handsomely rewarded.

Wonderful!

Off you go to see {@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia}. We're done here.

Craft cereleather. Bring it to me.

It couldn't be more straightforward.

Wonderful!

{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} has a little something for you.
Today's crafting job is luriacloth. Are you game, or should I just craft it myself?

You're on fire! And coming from a castanic, that's saying a lot.

Your aid to the Hands of Velika and our cause will not be forgotten. Please visit us again.
